name: Heroes of Issachar - Quest, Build Your Castle, Defend It
blurb: Heroes of Issachar is a faith-based Action RPG where you quest, build your castle, and defend it against the enemy.

rewards.reward: (Early Bird)  A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA).
A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA).
Alpha Tier - A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed.

A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed, AND:\r\na special, kickstarter only item of your choice. (choice will consist of a weapon, armor, mount, or accessory)

A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed, AND:\r\na special, kickstarter only, weapon and armor set. (consists of the entire set of special items from the above tier).

A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed, AND:\r\nan OUYA console (comes with one controller).  Console will be shipped upon kickstarter completion.

A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed, AND:\r\nhelp design an entire weapon and armor set.

A digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed,\r\nAND:\r\nhelp create a side quest and get co-developer credits in the game.

Have an NPC modeled after a person of your choosing.    ------- And, a digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed.

Have a secondary hero modeled after a person of your choosing. (Secondary heroes are key NPC's that accompany the main hero into battle) ------- And, a digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed.

Have a character playable as the main hero modeled after a person of your choosing.------- And, a digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed.

Help design a kingdom in the world.  Choose the look of the people, their allegiances and their backstory.  And of course, name the kingdom! ------- And, a digital copy of the game for any platform on which we release it (currently PC, Mac, Linux, OUYA), and access to our alpha builds as they are developed.
